resources.string:
Hello my name is Raul,
 I am recent software programming graduate
 who is currently seeking experience in the industry.
 I currently studying more languages and also tutoring
 on the weekends at CSN software labs.


I enjoy very much tutoring students, I keeps me interactive
 and involve with studies.

The studies of programming have been a
 challenging journey, but each little step
 taken have improve me drastically.

Know I have profession in multiple popular languages
 from the oldest one like C to newest one like Kotlin.
 Know I possess a solid arsenal when it comes to programming.
 I just a matter of knowing which path in the industry will
 head on.
s
